00023 #include <util/md5sum.h>
00024 //
00025 #include <cassert>
00026 #include <cstdio>
00027 #include <cstdlib>
00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <string>
00030 //
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace affx;
00033 
00034 char* self_test_data[]={
00035   // input, output
00036   "","d41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e",
00037   "a","0cc175b9c0f1b6a831c399e269772661",
00038   "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog","9e107d9d372bb6826bd81d3542a419d6",
00039   "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy cog","1055d3e698d289f2af8663725127bd4b",
00040   NULL, NULL
00041 };
00042 
00043 void
00044 self_test()
00045 {
00046   md5sum md5sum;
00047   std::string sum;
00048   char** dataptr;
00049 
00050   dataptr=self_test_data;
00051 
00052   while (*dataptr!=NULL) {
00053     // generate the hashes.  (we could have used "ofString()")
00054     md5sum.init();
00055     md5sum.update(*dataptr);
00056     md5sum.final(sum);
00057     //
00058     printf("%-15s: \"%s\"\n%15s: %32s\n%15s: %32s\n\n",
00059            "String",    *dataptr,
00060            "Reference", *(dataptr+1),
00061            "Computed",  sum.c_str());
00062     // computed MD5 should equal reference
00063     assert(sum==*(dataptr+1));
00064     // step input and reference.
00065     dataptr+=2;
00066   }
00067 }
00068 
00070 
00071 void nbo_test_int(unsigned int val,const std::string& ref)
00072 {
00073   md5sum md5sum;
00074   std::string sum;
00075   
00076   md5sum.init();
00077   md5sum.update_nbo(val);
00078   md5sum.final(sum);
00079  
00080   printf("0x%08x -> %32s\n",val,sum.c_str());
00081   assert(sum==ref);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void
00085 nbo_test()
00086 {
00087   md5sum md5sum;
00088   std::string sum;
00089 
00090   //
00091   nbo_test_int(     0,"f1d3ff8443297732862df21dc4e57262");
00092   nbo_test_int(     1,"f1450306517624a57eafbbf8ed995985");
00093   nbo_test_int(123456,"d747074027ce566f5dd8697337091787");
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 //
00098 int
00099 main(int argc,char* argv[])
00100 {
00101   if (argc==1) {
00102     self_test();
00103     nbo_test();
00104   }
00105   else {
00106     for (int a=1;a<argc;a++) {
00107       md5sum md5sum;
00108       std::string sum;
00109       md5sum.ofFile(argv[a],sum);
00110       printf("MD5(%s) = %s\n",argv[a],sum.c_str());
00111     }
00112   }
00113   //
00114   printf("ok.\n");
00115 }
